Українська: Ви впевнені, що бажаєте видалили це збереження?
Ви впевнені що хочете вийти з гри?
Досягнуто ліміт у 10 збережень.[n]Вам потрібно видалити якесь з них, щоб почати нову гру.

Визначає режим відображення гри, чи повинна вона залишитися у повноекранному режимі чи ні.[n][n]За замовченням: Увімкнено[n][n]Увага:[n]- «Безрамковий» режим може не працювати якщо у вас більше ніж 1 екран.
Визначає роздільну здатність вікна гри.[n][n]За замовченням: 1920 x 1080[n][n]Ця опція буде працювати тільки якщо опція «Режим перегляду» буде встановлена на «Віконний».
Визначає чи буде відображатися інтерфейс на екрані.[n]За замовченням: Увімкнено
Визначає мову гри.[n][n]Увага:[n]- Гру треба перезавантажити щоб зміни мови вступили в силу.

Визначає чи буде обрана мова гри в залежності від мови вашої операційної системи.[n][n]Увага:[n]- Щоб зміни вступили в силу, треба перезавантажити гру;[n][n]- Буде обрана та мова яка доступна у списку.
Визначає швидкість з якою відображаються діалоги.[n][n]За замовченням: Середня
Визначає які піктограми будуть відображатися у якості підказок керування.
Встановлює загальну гучність усіх звуків гри.[n][n]За замовченням: 10
Прийняти нові зміни налаштувань.[n][n]Увага:[n]- Вам може знадобитися перезавантажити гру, щоб деякі зміни вступили в силу.
У цього предмета поки що немає опису.
Ви впевнені, що бажаєте скинути налаштування за замовченням?

Клацніть на імена, щоб дізнатися більше про цих неймовірних людей.

Шматок черепа Демона-Клірика. Настільки потужний, що незважаючи на постійний вогонь, він не розпадеться. Коваль зможе використати цю кістку щоб виготувати ще один заряд для Чаши Демона, thanks to a gift that the Demon Sorcerers have given to all blacksmiths in Hell, which makes them able to manipulate the bones of Demon Clerics.

The blood of extinct Demon Clerics, wrapped in an absurdly powerful magical barrier. The only way to give it up is to grant it to a Cinder Totem, a totem created in the First Great Demon War, one of whose objectives was to channel the blood of the Demon Clerics into the medicines and healing spells of the Demon Sorcerers in order to avoid as much deaths as possible.
Солом’яних капелюх обв’язаний стрічкою. Збільшую дистанцію ваших атак.
Іржава клітка зроблена із червоного металу. Ви буде отримувати Отруєння і Окривавлення швидше, але ви будете отримувати зменшену шкоду від цих ефектів.
Простий аксесуар для голови. Збільшує Енергію та Удачу.
A necromance magic orb. Increases the damage and the damage negation of non-physic attacks.
A hat inspired by an ancient myth about a man who possessed superhuman powers and had the almost unattainable dream of becoming a king. Somehow that hat is still intact.
It was built to trap birds, but one day its purpose changed to not only trap birds, but also something obscure.
Armor of an old respectful knight.
Armor of an old graced templar.
Armor of an old feared profaned.
Kimono of an old cunning ronin.
Armor of an old bestial northern pilgrim.
Robes of an old rogue thief.
Cloak of an old wise magician.
Clothes of an old chaotic convict.
Shoulder pad with a sturdy iron plate. Increases strength and vitality.
Golden armor. It was once used by a great underground king.

This kimono has been passed down from generation to generation in Massaru's family. It is no longer in as perfect condition as it once was. Massaru still wears it out of respect for his great-grandfather, who was a great emperor in Otsumoshita.
A slender dagger with a serpent handle. Causes poison on foes.
A pair of very sharpened daggers, one straight and the other curved.
A pair of daggers so cold that crystallize itself. Causes freezing on foes.
A pair of crescent-shaped daggers, very powerful and agile.
A neither too big nor too small sword, strong and agile.
A straight sword, balanced between strength and agility.
A straight sword engraved with runes on its blade, blessed by Meapol.
A pair of bastard sword, great for consecutives attacks.
A greatsword forged directly by Huozue's blacksmiths. Causes pyromancy.
The greatsword of the warriors of the Darkness Congregation.
The ancient sword. its trully power is as unknown as its creation.
Swords capable of raising the dead.
The frozen sword of ancient legends. They say it's capable of killing a god.
A huge cleaver. Maybe it belonged to a giant butcher.
A simple and cheap katana, painted black, purple and green.
A long oriental sword, agile and effective, although it's not very sturdy.
The sword of a great long haired warrior, engraved with unknown runes.
The sword of an ancient warrior who composed soothing melodies for the soul.
Катана з заточеним клинком. Викликає кровотечу.
A katana and a wakizashi together, offensives and agile at the same time.
An axe forged from precarious resources by the desperation of a jailed soul.
The winded axe of Vuikur, one of the god of the Golden Divinity.
An axe forged from the bones of dead demons.
A wood batt that thickens on the end. Sturdy and strong.
A wood batt that thickens at the end, with wire and teeth embedded in it.
The hammer given to humans because of their devotion to the gods.
A red chandelier of unimaginable power.
A dark whip made with leather, reinforced with spikes.
A set of cleaver and axe, inseparable for bloodthirsty warriors.

Its owner, the famous and old Vinsir, together with the warriors of the Congregation of Darkness, battled against the Darkness to bring peace to Earth. He created calm and inspiring melodies to relieve his stress and that of his allies in this eternal war against the Dark. One day, Vinsir and his fellow fought against a great Fingran consumed by the Dark. His allie managed to win the battle and free the great beast's soul, but at the cost of sacrificing Vinsir's life. Today, in the Great Field of Ardiflowers, lies the tomb of the heroic composer.
It is said that this candlestick was forged by a great blacksmith blessed by Huozue.
Conjures a smoke of blood that chase enemies.
Casts orbs of darkness that chase enemies.
Increases the damage of magics and decreases their MP cost.
Hits the ground 3 times, exploding everything around with darkness.
Imbues night magic on the equipped weapon in the other hand.
Imbues pyromancy on the equipped weapon in the other hand.
Imbues fire on the equipped weapon in the other hand.
Imbues freezing on the equipped weapon in the other hand.
Imbues electricity on the equipped weapon in the other hand.
Imbues bleeding on the equipped weapon in the other hand.

Збільшує шкоду коли залишається мало ОЗ.

Збільшує характеристики, але збільшує шкоду яку ви отримуєте.
Збільшує кількість крові яку ви отримуєте із вбитих ворогів.

Increases attack when bleeding is nearby.

Blood is not lost when you die, but the ring breaks.
When you die, you rebirth exploding everything around you. Only works once.
Turns into a ghost for a brief moment and comes back to life after dying.
Becomes intangible after standing still for a while.
Enemies nearby become slower, but you lose a little HP for each enemy affected.
Becomes immune to any hits for a while after taking a great damage.
Restores a little the duration of effects when defeating enemies.
Each enemy defeated generates a damage negation buildup, but the buildup decreases over time.
Each enemy defeated generates a strength buildup, but the buildup decreases over time.

The sheet is extremely old and worn, but still perfectly legible:[n]"Hello, next adventurer, I'm glad you've also found this area, near this letter there is a purple totem. It is able to restore your vigor and cure any illness by resting near it and believing in its gift.”

The sheet is burnt, but it is possible to read part of it:[n]"...Due to its distance from the center of hell, being extremely cold and icy, it is almost impossible to survive without great preparation, such as warmer clothes and fires, for example. However, it wasn't always like this, the Fifth Layer was once the hottest of all, and had a king, the King of the Underground, Drensriel, who soon after winning his title, betrayed Mounds by trying to kill him to become the King of Hell. However, he was clearly defeated, Mounds is ruthless, there is no beating him... So the fifth layer has been moved as far away from the center as possible, as a way of showing that Mounds will show no mercy to anyone who goes against him..."

The sheet is torn and a little bit burnt, but still legible.[n]"...With his powers, Mounds creates a great flowery field, more than 500 billion kilometers long, in an attempt to imitate his old home, The Heavens. But the attempt failed in the blink of an eye. Mounds, furious, yells so loudly that the entire field is brutally burnt. The flowers, turned to ash. Trees, melted into lava. Flawed animals, turned into heaps of rotting flesh..."

The leaves are torn and a little burnt, but still legible.[n]"...His disciples, Doalpus and Alreeis, finished the construction. Finally, after 134 years, it was erected and ready to demonstrate the power and architecture of hell, Moundzian Castle, the domain of Mounds... In the castle's laboratory, Mounds and his disciples created, from the blood of Mounds and a female mammal, Mounds' maiden, Astrina... Once married, Mounds and Astrina had 4 children, called the first demonic beings, who, when they came of age, were given the title of Demon Leaders..."

A dead warrior, who due his honorable death in battle, has a body. However, were cruel in life, his everlast sentence is now fight forever against his equals, as a memory of his last moments of life, feeling every pain and the burden of causing so much suffering in life as.[n][n]Due the new dictatorship of Mounds, all the dead are now gradually growing stronger and becoming demons. Therefore, when they complete the transformation, they will be part of the army of Mounds in the attack to the Human Realm.

A huge and muscular dead warrior, killed in battle, so he keeps his body even in hell. However, for every place he passed, he caused desgrace. Now, forever, he will suffer in battles, remembering of his last moments of life and suffering his burden of the torments that caused in life.[n][n]Due the new dictatorship of Mounds, all the dead are now gradually growing stronger and becoming demons. Therefore, when they complete the transformation, they will be part of the army of Mounds in the attack to the Human Realm.

A golem forged from volcanic stones and magic that fought in the First Demon War. They usually use very powerful hammers or large flaming axes.[n][n]Eldaron, in a battle in the war, ended up getting lost, falling into the abandoned Fourth Layer of hell and was never found.

An annoying little Pure Demon capable of throwing fireballs. After killing their prey, they suck their blood to feed, just as certain insects from the Human Realm do.[n][n]These annoying creatures are the most distant type of pure demon from the Mounds bloodline, but still close compared to the Behegunes.

A golem forged from volcanic stones and magic that fought in the First Demon War. They usually use very powerful hammers or large flaming axes.[n][n]Eldaron, in a battle in the war, ended up getting lost, falling into the abandoned Fourth Layer of hell and was never found.
Тепер я живу один і продаю товари.
Hey hey hey! Calm down, sirrah.
Thou are another one of those whom came hither because of that annoying warlock, are not thou?
try once moe, die once moe.  Be reborn once moe.
ah... What are thou so much planning, warlock?
try once moe, die once moe.  Be reborn once moe.
ah... What are thou so much planning, warlock?
I am Randalya, I saved thou from that flaming monster.
I guess thou have met those purple totems, have not thou? I am afeard the one next to that demon hath already broken...

Those totems are called cinder totems, they are totems of worship that, when thou rest on 'em and receive in their power, they restore thy vigor and any tribulation in thy corporal agent, as well as being able to increase thy strength, market thy luggage and transfer thou to other totems thou've already found.
thy current equipment hath been well worn out due to thy arrival in hell. Towards the second floor of this building thou shall find a room with some equipment.
Yet remember that 'tis not only thou whom shall want equipment, choose just one of each peace. Other warriors hast recently arrived in hell, moe warriors than usual, e'en.
this building is home to others like me whom can help thou whenever thou want it.
that's all I hast to say.
May Moygo's benison be with thou.
Thou hast already done so much for me... I bid thou to offer me thy help once again.
I imagine thou hast known about Mounds, the Demon King, the Fallen Celestial Being.
From mine rituals, I discovered that he himself is preparing to invade the Earth, the realm of the living
To dominate it, and then ascend to heaven again and become the supreme god.
Nought good shall join of it, mine brother. He shall spread disgrace throughout the world, woe and suffering.
Argal I bid, Massaru. Thou are the only one that I trust of body and soul to be able to brow him, and then, defeat him.
Through mine witchcraft, I send thou to hell.

In the Character Info menu, you can check your status, level, attributes, attack power and more.[n][n]The information here reflects on your attacks and your damage negation against various types of damage, such that it can be increased by the armor and weapons you equip.

In the Equipment menu, you can equip weapons, armor, rings, gems and items.[n][n]Each piece of equipment in each category changes Massaru's strength in different ways. Weapons increase your attack power, armors increase your damage negation, rings and accessories grant you effects, gems grant effects to your weapon. All your equipment can give you other effects, such as a weapon giving you some effect, even if that's not its main function. The bag makes it easier for you to access items in your inventory.

In my Inventory, you can check all the items you own.[n][n]You can use them, generating some kind of gain or loss, depending on the item. Equip them, so you don't have to go to the Equipment menu to equip the item you want. Even discard them, if you no longer want an item in your inventory, but bear in mind that doing so will discard all the items you have of that type, that is, discarding an item that you have 10 amounts of, for example, will cause all 10 of your amounts to be discarded.

In the Bestiary menu, you can check out all the monsters you've encountered so far.[n][n]Here you can find out more about the monsters, their names, types, history, HP and attack power, damage negation and how many times you've defeated them.
